name: Doremi Labs
overview:
Doremi Labs, established in 1985, is a leading developer and manufacturer of digital servers and format converters for the broadcast, post production and Pro A/V markets and is the world’s leader in digital cinema technology.

Today its visionary team continues to expand its creative legacy by consistently delivering quality and reliability at affordable prices. Doremi is constantly introducing new technologies ranging from superior playback servers and mastering stations to access products and alternative content.

Doremi’s innovative engineering group developed and introduced the first digital cinema server capable of playing JPEG2000 digital cinema movies conforming to specifications established by the industry’s Digital Cinema Initiative (DCI). The company has continued to build on that success by accurately anticipating the needs of their customers. With unique vision and expertise it is defining rich systematic solutions that solve the challenges faced by the cinema industry as it continues to make the transition to entirely digital exhibitions.

Doremi’s family of digital cinema servers and mastering stations; its patented 4K technology; DCI certified product line; high frame rate (HFR) 3D servers and its continual pioneering advancements have defined the technology responsible for a new age of entertainment. They set the standard for quality and reliability and are installed in theaters and post-production facilities around the world.

Doremi maintains its world headquarters and production facilities in Burbank California (USA), European headquarters and R&D in Sophia-Antipolis (France), an office in Tokyo (Japan) to service the Asian marketplace, and two additional R&D entities out of Canada and EMEA (Europe, The Middle East, Africa). Doremi Cinema has delivered more digital cinema servers than any company in the world and has the production capacity to offer short delivery times.

milestones.description: Introducing the Doremi IMS1000 - Single Board Solution Delivers Higher Reliability and Lower Cost of Ownership. Combined SMS, Storage and Integrated Media Block (IMB)
Doremi Labs, the global leader in entertainment technology, is pleased to announce that total shipments of its Digital Cinema servers and IMBs have exceeded 50,000 units worldwide.
milestones.source_description: Doremi Labs Continues to Dominate Global Marketshare with Shipments Exceeding 50,000 Units in 2013
